text: Guitar Hero may mean: * Guitar Hero (series), a series of music video games published by RedOctane and Activision that includes the following titles: ** Guitar Hero (video game), the first video game in the series ** Guitar Hero II ** Guitar Hero Encore: Rocks the 80s ** Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock ** Guitar Hero III Mobile ** Guitar Hero World Tour * Guitar Hero (song), a song by Monkey Steals the Peach * Guitar Heroes, a 2004 classic music album by the Los Angeles Guitar Quartet
title: Guitar Hero
